enum_members.description: The client specified an invalid argument. HTTP Mapping: 400 Bad Request

enum_members.description: HTTP Mapping: 429 Too Many Requests

execution. HTTP Mapping: 400 Bad Request

enum_members.name: ABORTED
enum_members.description:
The operation was aborted, typically due to a concurrency issue such as a sequencer check
failure or transaction abort. HTTP Mapping: 409 Conflict

enum_members.description: The operation was attempted past the valid range. HTTP Mapping: 400 Bad Request

enum_members.name: UNIMPLEMENTED
enum_members.description: HTTP Mapping: 501 Not Implemented

enum_members.description:
Internal errors. This means that some invariants expected by the underlying system have been
broken. This error code is reserved for serious errors. HTTP Mapping: 500 Internal Server
Error

enum_members.name: UNAVAILABLE
enum_members.description: HTTP Mapping: 503 Service Unavailable

enum_members.name: DATA_LOSS
enum_members.description: Unrecoverable data loss or corruption. HTTP Mapping: 500 Internal Server Error.

parameters.name: updateType
parameters.description: The type of update to be performed on an email draft.

methods.name: setUpdateType(updateType)
methods.description:
Sets theUpdateDraftBodyTypeof this update action on the draft body. For example,
inserting content at the start, end, or cursor position of the draft body.

enum_members.name: IN_PLACE_INSERT
enum_members.description:
Default. Update actions insert content at the current cursor position, replacing any selected
content.

enum_members.name: INSERT_AT_START
enum_members.description: Update actions insert content at the start of message body.

enum_members.name: INSERT_AT_END
enum_members.description:
Update actions insert content at the end of the message body. If an email signature is present,
in Gmail on the web, the update action inserts after the user's signature. In the Gmail mobile
app, the update action inserts before the user's signature.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description:
The text to be shown for this item. Non-string primitive arguments are converted to
    strings automatically.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description:
The form input value that is sent via the callback. Non-string primitive arguments
    are converted to strings automatically.

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description:
Whether the item is selected by default. If the selection input only accepts
    one value (such as for radio buttons or a dropdown menu), only set this field for one item.

parameters.name: startIconUri
parameters.description:
For multiselect menus, the URL for the icon displayed next to the item's
    text field. Supports PNG and JPEG files.

parameters.name: bottomText
parameters.description:
For multiselect menus, a text description or label that's displayed below the
    item's text field.

methods.name: addItem(text, value, selected, startIconUri, bottomText)
methods.description: Adds a new item that can be selected.

enum_members.name: CENTER
enum_members.description: Vertically places the content at the center of the container. Default.

enum_members.name: TOP
enum_members.description: Vertically places the content at the top of the container.

enum_members.name: BOTTOM
enum_members.description: Vertically places the content at the bottom of the container.

enum_members.name: NOWRAP
enum_members.description: No wrapping. Default.

enum_members.name: WRAP
enum_members.description: Wraps the content for any widgets in a column.
